brainly_data.question: Why was ms maudie burning a fire in her stove all night?
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: Why was ms maudie burning a fire in her stove all night?
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: In an attempt to keep her plants from freezing, she left the stove on to keep them warm.

top_answer.question: Why was ms maudie burning a fire in her stove all night?
top_answer.subject: English
top_answer.text: In an attempt to keep her plants from freezing, she left the stove on to keep them warm.
